example_en: telephone number, email address, network address, website

synonyms_de: juristische Anschrift, offizielle Anschrift, gesetzlicher Wohnsitz, Firmenanschrift

definition_en: An address is the unique identity of a specific location of a  building.
A street name is an identifying name given to a street or road.
Combination of street + number, postal code, city, country
Address where you can send a mail.
uniquely addressable lockable box located on the premises of a post office station
